changelog.text: Added Support for Android TV. Now users Playlists sync through QR scan, smart playlist merging.
Implemented a custom update system with changelog display, download progress, auto-retry, and architecture-specific APK selection.
Added support for big picture images in local notifications. Added Landscape mode support for Party Room and Update Dialog.
Optimized queue updates by removing blocking network calls for metadata resolution. Fixed player stopping logic on queue completion.
Implemented a sequential download queue to prevent memory crashes and network timeouts.
Fixed playback logic for search results to ensure valid media URLs.

lockMessage: The app is temporarily locked for maintenance. Please check back later.
